plot.content:
This plot is a prototype made before the release of Plottable Mandelglitch.

Plottable Mandelglitch is based on a shader I created in 2020, but entirely reimplemented in the paradigm of plots. It combines various mandelbrot fractal distortions, noise and domain warping. 21 different inks palette and 5 different paper are possible.

next.content: This plot is one physical counterpart that was ordered by the digital owner of 'Plottable Golden Train #2'. Plottable Golden Train includes many variations (bridges, cactus, clouds, eagles, colors,...) entirely generated with code at mint (generative art).
